column2: Healthy in appearance and active in cage. Had ulcerating tumor by left ear. Another tumor was on the back of the skull-- both tumors being approximately pea sized.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
One tumor was ulcerating and other appeared normal.
Skull felt slightly soft upon incision, but was intact.
Extremely large nodule in thoracic cavity attached to lung along with some smaller nodules on lungs. Apparently didn't affect breathing too much as mouse appeared fine in cage.
